title: Evidence-Based Instructional Design Simulation for Improving Learning Retention in Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Targeting mid-level professionals responsible for organizational education operations, requiring personalized content that accommodates various learning styles.

learning_goals: Learners can design nursing education scenarios applying three or more learning styles (visual/auditory/kinesthetic) via VR simulations
Educational materials for five key nursing skills (medication administration, wound care, patient monitoring, etc.) can be developed using evidence-based teaching methods
Strategies can be established to improve learner engagement and educational effectiveness by 20% or more through formative assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
